metadata.description: A ninth assassin—more deadly than the eight who came before—has been hired to murder Darth Vader. Elsewhere, another threat to the Empire has made itself known, and will take Vader on a hunt for an ancient evil... All the while, the ninth assassin lurks, waiting for the perfect moment to strike! Collects the five-issue miniseries.
metadata.name: Star Wars: Darth Vader and the Ninth Assassin
